sentences.english: Bacterial leaching of copper-bearing pyrite is studied by use of thiobacillus ferrooxidans.
sentences.chinese: 采用氧化亚铁硫杆菌对含铜硫铁矿进行生物氧化研究。

sentences.english: The method has been applied to the analysis of the iron valence for ironstone.
sentences.chinese: 此法可用于铁矿中铁的价态分析。

sentences.english: The induced-flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了黄铜矿和黄铁矿的诱导浮选行为。

sentences.english: China's iron-ore import volumes actually fell in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 中国2010年铁矿石进口量反而下降。

sentences.english: The application of pyrites in Coal Gangue in Mercury wastewater treatment is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用煤系硫铁矿对含汞废水的处理进行了研究。

sentences.english: The Pyrite is one of main typomorphic characteristic of W-Sb-Au deposits series of western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿是湘西钨锑金矿床系列的主要标型矿物之一。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the situation of underground debris flow in Chengchao Mine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了程潮铁矿几次井下泥石流发生情况。

sentences.english: Spatially the Pyrite mineralization has a close tie with volcanic regime.
sentences.chinese: 硫铁矿化在空间分布上与火山构造关系密切。

sentences.english: They have just found a magnetite in this region.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这个地区刚刚发现一个磁铁矿。

sentences.english: The pyroelectricity characteristics of pyrite can be used as the indicators for prospecting of gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 黄铁矿的热电性特征可作为金矿的找矿标志。

sentences.english: Beijing has not said the detentions are tied to iron ore negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 北京方面并没有说拘留跟铁矿石谈判有关。

sentences.english: The effect of gangue composition on reduction swelling of iron ore pellets was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脉石成分对铁矿球团还原膨胀性能的影响。

sentences.english: The recent status and existing problems of reclamation work in Lanjian Iron Ore Mine are explained and discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文就兰尖铁矿在复垦中存在的问题及对策进行探讨。

sentences.english: The pulp concentration has effect on the leaching rate of pyrrhotite and marmatite.
sentences.chinese: 矿浆浓度对磁黄铁矿和铁闪锌矿的细菌浸出有影响。

sentences.english: The mixture of magnetite and quartz was separated by magnetic separation.
sentences.chinese: 磁铁矿和石英的混合矿样采用磁选分离。

sentences.english: Let's take a single instance in the global iron-ore-mining industry.
sentences.chinese: 就让我们用全球铁矿业这单一实例来说话吧。

definition: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
